properties.name: hassio.token
properties.description: API token to connect to hassio instance

properties.name: hassio.port
properties.description: Port on which hassio is running (normally 8123)

properties.name: spring.influx.rententionpolicy
properties.description: Rentention policy which should be used when inserting data into influxDB

properties.name: gatherer.updateinterval
properties.description: Interval of snapshots sent to influxDB in seconds. Always starts are second 0. Value of 15 means 0th, 15th, 30th, 45th second of every minute

properties.name: hassio.secure
properties.description: Should we use https or http (true = https)
